biotools.summary:
This is a random forest approach to predict treatment benefit in data from (failed) clinical drug trials.

R and Python code to run the RAINFOREST (tReAtment benefIt prediction using raNdom FOREST) algorithm R code was used to generate the original results. The python code may be more user friendly and is more configureable.

bioschemas.name: RAINFOREST
